com.mapdigit.gis.raster

Class MapTileDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapTileAbstractReader
      • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.MapTileDownloader

  • public class MapTileDownloader
extends MapTileAbstractReader
    MapTileDownloader download map image tiles from server (msn,yahoo,etc).

    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
